# Welcome to VS Code DevTools Logger! üéâ

Stop copy-pasting console errors to ChatGPT - capture everything automatically!

## üöÄ Quick Setup (2 Steps)

### Step 1: Create Desktop Shortcut
Click the button below to create a desktop icon that launches VS Code with logging enabled:

[$(desktop-download) Create Desktop Shortcut](command:devtools-logger.createDesktopShortcut)

_Note: You may need to run as administrator to place the icon on your desktop._

---

### Step 2: Launch VS Code
Double-click the desktop shortcut to start logging!

---

## üí° How It Works

1. The desktop shortcut launches VS Code with `ELECTRON_ENABLE_LOGGING` enabled
2. All console output is captured with human-readable timestamps
3. View formatted logs anytime with our commands
4. Share complete logs with AI assistants for better debugging!
